description:
Detects the use of the WMI command-line (WMIC) utility to identify and display various system information,
including OS, CPU, GPU, and disk drive names; memory capacity; display resolution; and baseboard, BIOS,
and GPU driver products/versions.
Some of these commands were used by Aurora Stealer in late 2022/early 2023.
author: TropChaud
name: Potential System Information Discovery Via Wmic.EXE
query: (((winlog.event_data.Description:"WMI Commandline Utility") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"wmic.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\WMIC.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*baseboard\ get\ product*" OR "*baseboard\ get\ version*" OR "*bios\ get\ SMBIOSBIOSVersion*" OR "*cpu\ get\ name*" OR "*DISKDRIVE\ get\ Caption*" OR "*LOGICALDISK\ get\ Name,Size,FreeSpace*" OR "*MEMPHYSICAL\ get\ MaxCapacity*" OR "*OS\ get\ Caption,OSArchitecture,Version*" OR "*path\ win32_VideoController\ get\ DriverVersion*" OR "*path\ win32_VideoController\ get\ name*" OR "*path\ win32_VideoController\ get\ VideoModeDescription*"))
